Dear Company_C team—thank you for outlining your priorities. Company_C remains my first choice, and I’d like to formally re-apply with the concrete end-to-end examples you requested.

1) End-to-end delivery (0→1 launch): Led a cross-functional project from problem definition and success metrics through build, launch, and iteration. I owned requirements, execution plan, stakeholder alignment, and post-launch analysis; shipped in 8 weeks and improved the primary KPI by ~18% within the first month via two rapid iterations.

2) Execution + measurable impact (optimization): Identified a key funnel drop-off, designed the experiment plan, coordinated implementation, and ran analysis. Shipped 3 A/B tests over 6 weeks; the winning variant increased conversion by ~9% and reduced time-to-complete by ~14%.

3) Domain/problem fit (applied work in a similar scope): Owned a recurring workflow used by internal teams, from discovery to rollout and enablement. Delivered a redesigned process/tooling update that reduced manual handling by ~30% and cut cycle time by ~22%, with clear adoption tracking.

If helpful, I can share a 1-page write-up for any of the above (context, constraints, decisions, and results). If selected, I’m ready to commit immediately. Thank you for reconsidering my application.
